QuestionText: Would you rather live for a year in complete darkness or for a year in nonstop daylight?
OptionA: Live in complete darkness for a year
OptionB: Live in nonstop daylight for a year
OptionC: Alternate between darkness and daylight every hour
OptionD: Switch every month between darkness and daylight
CorrectAnswer: Live in nonstop daylight for a year

QuestionText: Would you rather always have to tell the truth or never be able to speak again?
OptionA: Always have to tell the truth
OptionB: Never be able to speak again
CorrectAnswer: Always have to tell the truth

QuestionText: Would you rather have a rewind button for your life or a pause button for your life?
Would you rather have to fight 100 duck-sized horses or 1 horse-sized duck?
OptionC: Fight 50 duck-sized horses and 1 pony-sized duck

QuestionText: Would you rather be able to teleport anywhere or be able to read minds?
Would you rather always have to sing instead of speak or dance everywhere you go?
Would you rather eat only spicy food for a year or eat only bland food for a year?
Would you rather always lose your keys or always forget your phone?
Would you rather be able to change the past or see the future?
Would you rather have unlimited international first-class tickets or never have to pay for food at restaurants?
OptionB: Never pay for food at restaurants
